article_title: Fundraiser to help Lancaster attack victim
article_text:
Please enable Javascript to watch this video

Annika Horn was brutally attacked in her Lancaster home on September 6th. Against the odds, she is now recovering and donations have poured in from all over the world to help with medical costs.

Today Condessa Flawd from Figure Firm Total Fitness for Women spoke with us about a special fundraiser for Annika taking place this weekend-- and how you can help.
